tool_description: An API which shows latest updates and news in the field of technology.
name: Technology News Live
title: Technology News Live

api_list.name: Get updates from specific news source
api_list.description:
Get news update about technology from a specific news source.
various news source available are : cityam , thetimes , Guardian , telegraph , newyorktimes , latimes , eveningstandard , thehindu .
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://technology-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/Guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "technology-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://technology-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "technology-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Technology Updates Live
api_list.description: This endpoint will show technological updates from all the sources.
